Namespaces

namespace  Mesquite

Detailed Description

The NormSquaredSmoother Class is the concrete class that performs 1/2 times (the norm of T) squared smoothing.

NOTE (IMPORTANT): This smoother currently only works for tet elements.

Author:
Michael Brewer
Date:
2005-05-02
